entry.title: WIND WARNING , Crowsnest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Crowsnest 12:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: WNW 14 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 increasing to 70 gusting to 100 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries near the British Columbia border this evening. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
